roleset.name: to promote the growth of

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Los Alamos laboratory is one of three U.S. Department of Energy national laboratories designed as pilot centers to foster joint industry - government programs to speed the transfer of new superconductors to the marketplace .

propbank.arg: three U.S. Department of Energy national laboratories
joint industry - government programs to speed the transfer of new superconductors to the marketplace

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: The Fuji is a product of meticulous Japanese pomological engineering , which fostered it 50 years ago at a government research orchard .

example.name: nominal rel: fostering
example.text: Life is a struggle . The vitality of the country lies in the continuous heightening and fostering of the overall quality of all the people to constantly adapt to the development needs of the times

propbank.arg: of the overall quality of all the people

roleset.note: FOSTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'foster' based on WSJ; nominal 'fostering' based on BOLT-7. (from foster.01-v)
FOSTERING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from fostering.01-n)
